TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug that protects healthy tissues from the toxic effects of anticancer drugs.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "pentetic acid calcium"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "ácido pentético cálcico"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que protege los tejidos sanos de los efectos tóxicos de los medicamentos contra el cáncer.
